title: AlixPartners Exec. Chairman: Disruption the New Norm Among CEOs
description:
Simon Freakley, AlixPartners Executive Chairman, says CEOs are adapting to intense disruption and managing through volatile times. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.”
 (Source: Bloomberg)
